text:
Ah... Sorry.
It seems I was overthinking during today's shoot.

...Not as part of L'Antica,
but as an individual, Sakuya Shirase.

How should I be captured on film...
How should I be perceived...

Producer, you assured me
that I'm a proper idol, didn't you?
Thanks to that... it feels like my doubts have cleared.

Whether I'm with L'Antica
or as an individual.

I'll just keep striving
for the fans who support me...!
